decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the Reasonable Exemption Statement 12.05.2023 hereby approved and and thereafter maintained.Reason: In the interests of Fire Safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021.

The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Changes to fenestrations including replacement of existing casement window with oriel window and existing French doors with pivot door, and over-cladding of the existing rear ground floor facade with vertical larch planks
